page.title: 02ATTITUDES IN CURDWORTH
page.content: GENERALLY, PEOPLES ATTITUDES TOWARDS LIVING IN CURDWORTH ARE FAVOURABLE SOME OLDER MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY REMEMBER WITH SADNESS THE TIME WHEN IT WAS A SMALL COUNTRY VILLAGE WITH COTTAGES AND FARMHOUSES PLUS A SMALL NUMBER OF WATER BOARD DWELLINGS, SURROUNDED BY FIELDS AND TREE LINED LANES HOWEVER DESPITE CHANGES THAT HAVE TAKEN PLACE, WITH THE DEMOLITION OF MANY OLDER PROPERTIES AND THE BUILDING OF NEW ESTATES, PEOPLE ENJOY LIVING IN CURDWORTH AND THE COMMUNITY SPIRIT WITH ITS CARING ATTITUDES, REMAINS FAMILY BEREAVEMENTS HAVE LED TO THE DEVELOPMENT OF NEW FRIENDSHIPS AND THE CEMENTING OF OLD ONES. PEOPLE FEEL THIS IS A PLEASANT PLACE TO LIVE IN BECAUSE OF THE CARING ATTITUDE TO OLDER RESIDENTS AND NEWCOMERS ALIKE. THERE IS A CONCERNED ATTITUDE TO THE ENVIRONMENT.
